data.title: Seizure of Asya Bank in Turkey
data.meta_description: Question for written answer E-001923/2015 to the Commission Rule 130 Takis Hadjigeorgiou (GUE/NGL)
data.text:
Question for written answer E-001923-15

to the Commission

Rule 130

Takis Hadjigeorgiou (GUE/NGL)

On Tuesday, 3 February 2015 the Turkish Bank Regulatory Authority (BDDK) announced the seizure of Asya Bank for alleged infringements of Turkish banking regulations.

In view of the fact that Turkey is an applicant for EU accession:
